turkish_example_sentence: Ben doktor Ahmet'i acil durumlarda hemen aramam lazım.
english_example_sentence: I need to call doctor Ahmet immediately in emergency situations.
russian_example_sentence: Мне нужно звонить врачу Ахмету немедленно в чрезвычайных ситуациях.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben doktor Ahmet'i acil durumlarda hemen ______ lazım.
